events.message: The customer reported a collision involving their car and a streetlight on April 30th at 6 PM.
The claim was categorized under Auto Accident due to keywords such as vehicle collision and damages described.
An experienced claims agent has been assigned to manage the vehicle accident claim promptly.
The insurer sent an acknowledgment to the customer confirming receipt of the auto accident claim.
We requested police reports, photographs of the vehicle damage, and a detailed description of the accident.
Customer provided all required documents including accident photos and official police report as requested.
The claims department began investigation to assess damages and verify the circumstances of the accident.
Investigation concluded with full damage assessment confirming vehicle repairs are necessary.
A settlement offer was proposed to cover the repairs and ancillary costs related to the auto accident.
Customer responded positively, indicating satisfaction with the prompt proposed settlement amount.
The auto accident claim was approved based on investigation findings and customer acceptance.
Claim payment was issued to the customerâ€™s bank account to cover the documented vehicle repair expenses.
The claim was officially closed after payment was confirmed and all obligations were fulfilled.
